caption: How to use EasySubmit?
desc1: Create a homework (quiz or attendance) page by clicking on the corresponding button on the Home page
desc2: Enter the title and the description of the assignment. Attach files if needed.
desc3: Click on the button to generate a link for the homework (quiz or attendance) page and new page will be created.
desc4: Copy the generated link and share it with your students. Track their submissions.
